findings.lungs: Visualized lung fields are within normal limits. No evidence of pleural or pericardial effusion.
findings.liver: Homogenous attenuation throughout. No evidence of focal lesions or biliary dilatation.
findings.pancreas: Normal attenuation throughout, no focal lesions or ductal dilatation.
findings.spleen: Mildly enlarged with a maximum length of 15.2 cm.
findings.kidneys: Normal and symmetric size with normal nephrogram, no solid lesions or hydronephrosis.
findings.small_bowel: Normal caliber, wall thickness, and enhancement.
findings.appendix: Mildly enlarged at 8 mm with some hazy increased attenuation in the adjacent fat and hypervascularity.
findings.pelvis: No free fluid in the pelvis.
findings.reproductive_organs: Prostate and seminal vesicles grossly unremarkable.
findings.vascular: No abdominal aortic aneurysm or atherosclerotic disease.
findings.bones: No evidence of worrisome osseous lesions or acute fracture.
findings.soft_tissues: Very small fat containing umbilical hernia.
